meeting_info.organization: Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the September 3, 2024, meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.

agenda_items.title: Discuss City Manager Brochure
agenda_items.description: Discuss the finalizing of the Dallas City Manager Brochure prepared by Baker Tilley.

agenda_items.title: Resolution on Legislative Travel Funds
agenda_items.description: A resolution amending the city's policy governing the use of legislature travel funds in order to more efficiently allow for councilmembers to travel to Austin and Washington D.C to speak on legislative matters.
